// Program to demonstrate the MD_Parola library
//
// Simplest program that does something useful - Hello World!
//
// MD_MAX72XX library can be found at https://github.com/MajicDesigns/MD_MAX72XX
//

#include <MD_Parola.h>
#include <MD_MAX72xx.h>
#include <SPI.h>

// Define the number of devices we have in the chain and the hardware interface
// NOTE: These pin numbers will probably not work with your hardware and may
// need to be adapted
//#define HARDWARE_TYPE MD_MAX72XX::GENERIC_HW
#define HARDWARE_TYPE MD_MAX72XX::FC16_HW
#define MAX_DEVICES 2

#define CLK_PIN   13 //black
#define DATA_PIN  11 //grteen
#define CS_PIN    10 //ora

// Hardware SPI connection
//MD_Parola P = MD_Parola(HARDWARE_TYPE, CS_PIN, MAX_DEVICES);
// Arbitrary output pins
MD_Parola myDisplay = MD_Parola(HARDWARE_TYPE, DATA_PIN, CLK_PIN, CS_PIN, MAX_DEVICES);
MD_MAX72XX mxObj = MD_MAX72XX(HARDWARE_TYPE, DATA_PIN, CLK_PIN, CS_PIN, MAX_DEVICES);

int cols = 8;
int delayMs = 800;
char letter = 'a';
int pos = 0;
#define numFrames 347

const byte llamita[numFrames][16] = {
  {B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000010,B00000111,B00001111,B00001111,B00001111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011110,B00011110},

{B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000111,B00001111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111},
{B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000011,B00000111,B00001111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111},
{B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000111,B00001111,B00001111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00001111},
{B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000000,B00000011,B00000111,B00001111,B00001111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00011111,B00001111}
};

void setup(void)
{

  myDisplay.begin();
  myDisplay.setIntensity(2);

  // Clear the display
  myDisplay.displayClear();
  //myDisplay.displayScroll("666", PA_CENTER, PA_SCROLL_UP_LEFT  , 70);


  mxObj.begin();
  //mxObj.setIntensity(0);

  // Clear the display
  //mxObj.displayClear();
  cols = mxObj.getColumnCount();

  //mxObj.transform(MD_MAX72XX::TRC);
}

void loop(void) {
  displayFlama(false);
  //mxObj.clear();
  //displayString("TAMARISTA LA GUAPISTA", 40);
  //corners();

  //  mxObj.setPoint(0, 0, true);
  //  mxObj.setPoint(7, cols-1, true);

  //mxObj.setRow(0,0,"B0011110");
  //mxObj.setRow(1,0,"B1000011");

  //mxObj.setColumn(0,"B0011110");
  //mxObj.setColumn(2,"B1101000");
}



void displayFlama(bool rows) {

  for ( int j = 0; j < numFrames-1; j++ ) {

    for (int i = 0; i < cols; i++ ) {
      if (rows) {
        mxObj.setRow(i, llamita[j][i]);
      } else {
        mxObj.setColumn(i, llamita[j][i]);
      }
    }
    delay(1);
  }
}
void displayString(String string, int delayMs) {

  letter = string[pos];
  for ( int i = 0; i < 20; i++ ) {
    mxObj.clear();
    mxObj.setChar( i, letter );
    delay(delayMs);
  }
  if (pos > string.length()) {
    pos = 0;
  } else {
    pos++;
  }

}

void corners() {
  myDisplay.setTextAlignment(PA_CENTER);

  myDisplay.print("0,0");
  mxObj.setPoint(0, 0, true);
  delay(delayMs);
  mxObj.clear(0);

  myDisplay.print("0,e");
  mxObj.setPoint(0, cols - 1, true);

  delay(delayMs);
  mxObj.clear(0);

  myDisplay.print("e,0");
  mxObj.setPoint(7, 0, true);
  delay(delayMs);
  mxObj.clear(0);

  myDisplay.print("e,e");
  mxObj.setPoint(7, cols - 1, true);
  delay(delayMs);
  mxObj.clear(0);

}
